alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 09 at 2:34PM PDT until August 09 at 3:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM PDT FOR EAST CENTRAL LINCOLN COUNTY... At 233 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pioche, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs and trees. Locations impacted include... Ursine, Pioche, Ranch Campground, Horsethief Gulch Campground, Eagle Valley, Meadow Valley Campground, Panaca, Echo Canyon State Park and Cathedral Gorge State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
